Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning consists of an episodic account of evil and chaos during famine (one incident involves his family going without breakfast for days), juxtaposed with a savage picture of the Japanese war efforts in China.
